name: QUICKBITS
description:
This game simulates the exciting field of the worldwide financial transaction processes associated with Commodity Trading. You want to make sure your company is trading physical derivatives in order to keep their costs afloat. Derivatives such as futures contracts, Swaps, Exchange-traded Commodities,forward contracts have become the primary trading instruments in commodity markets. Futures are traded on regulated commodities exchanges. Over-the-counter (OTC) contracts are privately negotiated bilateral contracts entered into between the contracting parties directly.

How to play: There are three types of commodities - Base, Complex and Product.

A product requires 2 Complex resources to create. A complex resource requires a Base resource to create.
While holding a resource of any type hitting [NUM+ will add that resource to your pot.

Press [NUM0 to dump all resources in your pot for their current rate. Any resource held will be destroyed if not added to an appropriate machine or dumped into the memory.

Enjoy!
